title: Best of The Herd for Apr 02, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 02, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin

The Cowboys did things out of order and now they have to take big risks

The Patriots won't make the same mistakes other teams make by overpaying a QB

NBA Playoffs in Vegas are a great plan


Guest: Greg Cosell, NFL Films

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
